PHRASE.LANG: 『白騎士物語®－古の鼓動－』の主人公、レナードが変身した姿です。
The White Knight that the main character Leonard transforms into as seen in White Knight Chronicles™.
The White Knight that the main character Leonard transforms into as seen in White Knight Chronicles™.
Voici la forme que revêt Léonard, le héros de White Knight Chronicles™, lorsqu'il se métamorphose.
Il Cavaliere Bianco in cui si trasforma Leonard in White Knight Chronicles™.
El Caballero Blanco en el que Leonard, el protagonista, se transforma en White Knight Chronicles™.
Der White Knight, in den sich die Hauptfigur Leonard in White Knight Chronicles™ verwandelt.
